attributes.title: Bad

attributes.title: Horrible app!!!!!!!
attributes.review: The game was so glitchy!!! It took hours to load and took my money without my consent!! This app must be taken down IMMEDIATELY!😫😫

attributes.title: Don’t get!!
attributes.review: I wish I could give it zero stars. I downloaded the app to support my president but the app gave my phone a virus.

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: This app is terrible it kept glitching me out and it would give me porn site viruses with trump having sex it’s inappropriate

attributes.title: The walking meme
attributes.review: This is a horrible app and that’s on period.  I don’t want a president that sulks in a corner when ever not enough people comes to his rally.

attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: I WAS SO EXCITED TO PURCHASE MY TICKETS FOR THE UPCOMING RALLY. unfortunately i couldn’t pick more then 1. Me and my friend Clah and Midiah  wanted to go #TRUMP2020💪🏼💪🏼. when i went to reserve my ticket the app called me a sp*c but thats ok because i love TRUMP

attributes.title: I was told it would cure my depression. Very dissatisfied.
attributes.review: I suffer from depression and Donald trumps dry comedy would help but this app made me want to kill myself. I no longer support this man.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app made my pp shrink 10 times in size every time I opened it, I would not recommend this app😤🤚 unless you want a small pp..........ok bye

attributes.title: IT NEVER DOWNLOADED???
attributes.review: I waited forEVER for this to load on my phone and it just sat there for days. NOT WORTH THE DOWNLOAD. the time i spent putting in my password for this was wasted. DO NOT EVEN TRY. 😒😒😾😾

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!!
attributes.review: this app doesn’t work well, it took forever to download, and it is SO GLITCHY! also, it spreads hate and discrimination. who knew! black lives matter ✨
